description: From Middle English overladen, equivalent to over- +‎ lade. Cognate with Dutch overladen (“to overlade, overload”), German überladen (“to overload, overburden”), Swedish överladda (“to overload, overcharge”).

verbs.description: overlade (third-person singular simple present overlades, present participle overlading, simple past overladed, past participle overladed or overladen)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To load with too great a cargo or other burden; overburden; overload.
